name: Pendulad
description:
Play as a half-pendulum/half-lad in the fast paced and difficult indie platformer, Pendulad! Make use of pendulum physics to swing through levels. Pendulad is a work in progress and I plan to make frequent updates! Below is a link to the google drive where I have every past version of the game posted in case you'd like to see the progress, as well as some other links. Thank you!

Works best with a mouse!

WASD and SPACE!

Past Versions: Google Drive

YouTube: GryphiGameDev

Reddit Post: Pendulad Post
